content: holly leaves make 1 per leaf use the cable cast on throughout * cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and emerald green yarn row 1 rs cast off 2 sts slip the 1 stitch on the rh needle back onto the lh needle * 2 sts horse chestnut leaf row 2 to 4 repeat from * to * three more times 8 sts ⇨ note the other leaf is knit in dark red instead of orange row 5 cast on 4 sts cast off 2 sts k8 byf turn 2 times k6 byf turn k7 10 sts make 1 per leaf * cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and orange yarn row 6 cast on 2 sts cast off 4 sts slip the 1 stitch on the rh needle back onto the lh needle 8 sts 1st small leaflet row 7 to 10 repeat row 6 four more times to cast row 1 ws kfb sl1 wyif 3 sts off all sts and break the yarn row 2 kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 4 sts row 3 to 5 repeat row 2 three more times 7 sts * holly berries row 6 to 10 k6 sl1 wyif make 1 per berry cast on 3 sts using 3 25mm row 11 k2tog knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 6 sts single pointed needles and red yarn row 12 to 13 repeat row 11 two more times 4 sts row 1 rs kfb 3 times 6 sts break the working yarn and transfer the 4 sts onto a row 2 to 4 starting on a ws purl row work 3 stitch holder *** row in st st 2nd medium leaflet row 5 k2tog 3 times 3 sts ** follow the 1st small leaflet patt from * to * pull through to cast off 7 sts row 6 to 7 kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 9 sts making up for each leaf weave in cast on/off tails row 8 to 12 k8 sl1 wyif on ws for each berry sew a running stitch around the outside edge pull the yarn to gather up the row 13 k2tog knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 8 sts autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 9 of 19 row 14 to 17 repeat row 13 four more times 4 sts ladybirds break the working yarn and transfer the 4 sts onto a ladybird body stitch holder ** ⇨ note the other 3rd large leaflet ladybird on my wreath is follow the 1st small leaflet patt from * to * 7 sts knit in dark red instead row 6 to 9 kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 11 sts of red row 10 to 14 k10 sl1 wyif make 1 per ladybird cast on 10 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and red yarn start at the row 15 k2tog knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 10 sts bottom end row
